texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: I'm  always interested to talk to college students  about technology and business in general. They have amazing ideas and they don't place any limits on themselves. In particular, their curiosity is limitless.
texts.text: I'm  always interested to talk to college students  about technology and business in general. They have amazing ideas and they don't place any limits on themselves. In particular, their curiosity is limitless.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: A great question
texts.text: A great question

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: I joined several other local employers at the  University of Texas at San Antonio  last week for mock interviews with computer science students. We went through plenty of sample questions and gave feedback to the students on their content and delivery during the mock interviews. At the end, we opened it up for questions.
texts.text: I joined several other local employers at the  University of Texas at San Antonio  last week for mock interviews with computer science students. We went through plenty of sample questions and gave feedback to the students on their content and delivery during the mock interviews. At the end, we opened it up for questions.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: One student asked a question that really made me pause:
texts.text: One student asked a question that really made me pause:

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: What's the one thing that you learned while working that you didn't learn in college? What should we know that we won't learn in the classroom?
texts.text: What's the one thing that you learned while working that you didn't learn in college? What should we know that we won't learn in the classroom?

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: Thinking it through
texts.text: Thinking it through

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: There are plenty of obvious things that came to mind when I thought about it:
texts.text: There are plenty of obvious things that came to mind when I thought about it:

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: Be a team player
texts.text: Be a team player

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: Remember the customer
texts.text: Remember the customer

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: Think globally, act locally
texts.text: Think globally, act locally

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: Don't "call the baby ugly"
texts.text: Don't "call the baby ugly"

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: Learn something new every day
texts.text: Learn something new every day

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: However, many of these are cliche or difficult to teach. It takes some real world experience with real people on real projects to really understand them. There must be some correlation between these things I've learned since I entered the business world.
texts.text: However, many of these are cliche or difficult to teach. It takes some real world experience with real people on real projects to really understand them. There must be some correlation between these things I've learned since I entered the business world.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Then it hit me. The biggest key to my own success rests upon a single word:  curiosity .
texts.text: Then it hit me. The biggest key to my own success rests upon a single word:  curiosity .

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: Being curious
texts.text: Being curious

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: I've always been curious about things for as long as I can remember. I've questioned everything at one time or another and demanded to know the real story behind events in my work and personal life.
texts.text: I've always been curious about things for as long as I can remember. I've questioned everything at one time or another and demanded to know the real story behind events in my work and personal life.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Being curious allows me to approach new things with more wonder and less fear. It has stopped me in my tracks when I've tried to pass judgement on a person or a situation without asking the right questions first. It has brought me closer to more people at work, in open source communities, and at home.
texts.text: Being curious allows me to approach new things with more wonder and less fear. It has stopped me in my tracks when I've tried to pass judgement on a person or a situation without asking the right questions first. It has brought me closer to more people at work, in open source communities, and at home.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: It's not always easy. Being curious is exhausting. There are many times where I've wanted less change and I've rejected new ways of doing things. When those situations arise, I take a break and think about something else. I come back to it with more energy and a myriad of questions.
texts.text: It's not always easy. Being curious is exhausting. There are many times where I've wanted less change and I've rejected new ways of doing things. When those situations arise, I take a break and think about something else. I come back to it with more energy and a myriad of questions.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Being curious also leads you down those paths less traveled. Robert Frost's poem,  The Road Not Taken , ends with a paragraph that has special meaning to me as a curious person:
texts.text: Being curious also leads you down those paths less traveled. Robert Frost's poem,  The Road Not Taken , ends with a paragraph that has special meaning to me as a curious person:

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: I shall be telling this with a sigh
texts.text: I shall be telling this with a sigh

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Somewhere ages and ages hence:
texts.text: Somewhere ages and ages hence:

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Two roads diverged in a wood, and I-
texts.text: Two roads diverged in a wood, and I-

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: I took the one less traveled by,
texts.text: I took the one less traveled by,

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: And that has made all the difference.
texts.text: And that has made all the difference.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Being curious has taken me down this path less traveled many times. Almost every trip has been worth the trouble.
texts.text: Being curious has taken me down this path less traveled many times. Almost every trip has been worth the trouble.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: Curiosity crushes cynicism
texts.text: Curiosity crushes cynicism

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Anyone who works in technology, especially software development or system administration, has found themselves looking over a block of code or a server deployment that someone else has prepared. Many of us have had one of these moments:
texts.text: Anyone who works in technology, especially software development or system administration, has found themselves looking over a block of code or a server deployment that someone else has prepared. Many of us have had one of these moments:

texts.label: caption
texts.orig: Clint Eastwood is disgusted
texts.text: Clint Eastwood is disgusted

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: clint_eastwood_disgusted.gif
texts.text: clint_eastwood_disgusted.gif

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: That's totally natural.  It's human nature.
texts.text: That's totally natural.  It's human nature.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Luckily, that's a habit we can break and curiosity can be the tool that breaks it. Instead of immediately passing judgement, start making a list of questions in your head:
texts.text: Luckily, that's a habit we can break and curiosity can be the tool that breaks it. Instead of immediately passing judgement, start making a list of questions in your head:

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: Why was this designed in this way?
texts.text: Why was this designed in this way?

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: Is this something I can change?
texts.text: Is this something I can change?

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: What was the original use case?
texts.text: What was the original use case?

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: Is there a better way to do this that already exists?
texts.text: Is there a better way to do this that already exists?

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: Who worked on it originally and what was their charter or goal?
texts.text: Who worked on it originally and what was their charter or goal?

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: This situation appears  very frequently  in open source software. Quickly passing judgement about a particular piece of software or user community can often to the dangerous cycle of  Not Invented Here (NIH) . This leads to competing standards, projects, and communities.
texts.text: This situation appears  very frequently  in open source software. Quickly passing judgement about a particular piece of software or user community can often to the dangerous cycle of  Not Invented Here (NIH) . This leads to competing standards, projects, and communities.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: A healthier approach is to look over the software and the community with a curious approach. Start asking questions and sharing your unique use cases with the community. You might find others in the community with a similar need and this can often convince the herd to change direction. Instead of building something on your own, you will belong to a community and stand on the shoulders of the work that is already done.
texts.text: A healthier approach is to look over the software and the community with a curious approach. Start asking questions and sharing your unique use cases with the community. You might find others in the community with a similar need and this can often convince the herd to change direction. Instead of building something on your own, you will belong to a community and stand on the shoulders of the work that is already done.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: My advice for students
texts.text: My advice for students

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: My advice here is the same as what I told the UTSA student last week:  always be curious .
texts.text: My advice here is the same as what I told the UTSA student last week:  always be curious .

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Let curiosity drive your decisions and your growth.
texts.text: Let curiosity drive your decisions and your growth.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Let curiosity push you through the challenging or difficult times.
texts.text: Let curiosity push you through the challenging or difficult times.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Let curiosity guide your interactions with other people and encourage them to be curious as well.
texts.text: Let curiosity guide your interactions with other people and encourage them to be curious as well.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: As you refocus your energy from cynicism to curiosity, the momentum will build. Being curious will become one of the most beneficial habits you'll ever make.
texts.text: As you refocus your energy from cynicism to curiosity, the momentum will build. Being curious will become one of the most beneficial habits you'll ever make.
